message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $10000 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $9000 for it. Please let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to come down to $9250. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay up to $9100 for the product. Let me know if this is something we can work with.
